SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT QNA.NO ,QT.QNA_TYPE ,QNA.TITLE ,QNA.CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(QNA.MODIFY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MODIFY_DATE , QNA.ENROLL_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA JOIN QNA_TYPE QT ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_NO = QT.NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = 2 ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT QNA.NO , MB.ID ,QT.QNA_TYPE ,QNA.TITLE ,QNA.CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(QNA.MODIFY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MODIFY_DATE , QNA.ENROLL_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA JOIN QNA_TYPE QT ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_NO = QT.NO JOIN MEMBER MB ON QNA.MEMBER_NO = MB.NO ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT QNA.NO ,QT.QNA_TYPE ,QNA.TITLE ,QNA.CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(QNA.MODIFY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MODIFY_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER ,TO_CHAR(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS ANSWER_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA JOIN QNA_TYPE QT ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_NO = QT.NO WHERE QNA.NO = #{NO}

SELECT QNA.NO , MB.ID ,QT.QNA_TYPE ,QNA.TITLE ,QNA.CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(QNA.MODIFY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MODIFY_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER ,TO_CHAR(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS ANSWER_DATE ,QNA.ANSWER_YN FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER MB ON QNA.MEMBER_NO = MB.NO JOIN QNA_TYPE QT ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_NO = QT.NO
